translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The Chapter on the Pairs of Doctrinal Ideas

original: Dhammapaccanīya (2), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2)🔽8.49. Kilesaduka🔽Nokilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nokilesaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi  kilesaduka  no kilesam dhammam paṭicca no kilesaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā no kilesam dhamma

original: paṭicca nanokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nokilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nokileso🔽ca nanokileso ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.🔽Nanokilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.🔽Nokilesañca nanokilesañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: paṭicca na no kilesaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā no kilesam dhammam paṭicca no kilesaḥ  ca na nokileso ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā  na no kilesam dhammam paṭicca na no kilesaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi  no kilesam ca na no kilesam ca dhammam paṭicca no kilesaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi
translated: With a corruption as condition there arises a corruption. With a corruption as condition there arises a non-corruption. With a corruption as condition there arise a corruption and a non-corruption.🔽With a non-corruption as condition there arises a non-corruption. … three triplets.🔽With a corruption and a non-corruption as condition there arises a corruption. … three triplets. (Abbreviated.)

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha nava.)
analyzed: hetuyā nava pe vipāke ekam pe avigate nava sabbattha nava
translated: In the case of cause, there are nine; … in the case of result, one; … in the case of kamma, one; … in the case of nutriment, one; … in the case of faculty, one; … in the case of jhāna, one; … in the case of path, one; … in the case of association, one; … in the case of dissociation, one; … in the case of presence, one; … in the case of absence, one; … in the case of disappearance, one; … in the case of non-disappearance, one; … in the case of arising, one; … in the case of falling away, one; … in the case of supported, one; … in the case of supported and unsupported, one; … in the case of supported and disappearance, one; … in the case of supported and non-disappearance, one; … in the case of supported and arising, one; … in the case of supported and falling away, one; … in the case of supported and past, one; … in the case of supported and future, one; … in the case of supported and present, one; … in the case of supported and past and future, one; … in the case of supported and past and present, one; … in the case of supported and future and present, one; … in the case of supported and past and future and present, one; … in the case of root, one; … in the case of non-root, one; … in the case of root and non-root, one; … in the case of root and kamma, one; … in the case of root and kamma and kamma-result, one; … in the case of root and kamma and kamma-result and nutriment, one; … in the case of root and kamma and kamma-result and nutriment and faculty, one; … in the case of root and
